listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: No refund after booking

listing.listing_description:
Add sophisticated style to your ski holiday at Quandary Peak Penthouse 704. Beautifully appointed with an eye to contemporary glam, this spacious Colorado vacation rental has an open-plan layout and can sleep twelve in its four suite-style bedrooms. Convenient shared amenities at One Steamboat Place, mountain views and a location at the base of Steamboat Ski Resort round out the property’s charms.

Guests of One Steamboat Place are invited to use the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center and winter shuttle service. Gather with family in the communal games room, or let the kids play in the Little Tykes room while the grown-ups enjoy a session in the wine tasting room or a massage in the spa. For entertaining in private, the penthouse has its own balcony with a barbecue and mountain views, as well as a media room.

Vaulted ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows and neutral tones give Quandary Peak Penthouse 704 a spacious feel and refined appeal. Soft hues of taupe, gray and gold give the open-plan living and dining areas a restful ambience that’s enhanced by the welcoming stone fireplace and broad dining table. The fully equipped kitchen is equally stylish and features a breakfast bar and Viking appliances.

Each of the four bedrooms in this luxury villa has an en-suite bathroom for privacy and convenience. There are two bedrooms with king beds, mountain views and balconies, including a romantic master suite with its own gas fireplace. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and if you need more space, the media room has a queen bunk bed.

A stay at Quandary Peak Penthouse 704 puts the incredible slopes and lively après-ski scene of Steamboat Springs at your doorstep. In the winter, you’re just steps from Steamboat Ski Resort; in the summer, you’re just a short drive from Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course and kayaking, fishing and rafting in the Yampa River. Be sure to make time for a soak in the area’s namesake springs, whether that’s the family-friendly Old Town or the honeymoon-worthy natural rock pools of Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With close access to famous Venice Beach, this modern, well-lit and stylish villa makes good use of inventive and bold design, both inside and out. With a tree-shaded pool, airy courtyard spaces, and artful interior that emphasizes light and space, this peaceful home’s every angle and furnishing has been carefully chosen. The beach, Santa Monica, and Rodeo Drive are just a short drive away.

One of the most striking aspects of Palms is the wealth of breathing space that each room offers. From the lengthy stone counters of the twin-mirrored bathroom, to the inviting tiled expanse and solitude of the outdoor reclining station. Guests will love the atmosphere of the sunny breakfast balcony, while the wide, welcome shade of the courtyard is punctuated by comfortable chairs and chic, cushioned seats. The private space of the decadent bedrooms, complete with nice touches like the end-of-bed TVs, help instill a sense of comfort around the home, as does the poolside willow tree.

From the ample parking area of this home, guests can soon be at a number of well-known LA landmarks within minutes. The sun, surf and sand of Venice Beach is just a few minutes away, as are the historic and scenic waterways of the Venice Canals. Guests can explore the myriad shopping and entertainment options of Rodeo Drive, while fascinating high culture attractions like the Getty Center art museum are close by. With Palms, the galaxy of choices and options that LA provides is on your doorstep.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Summit Peak Penthouse epitomizes classic Colorado alpine charm with all of Steamboat Springs at your fingertips. Located within the luxury residential complex One Steamboat Place, this four-bedroom vacation rental gives you sumptuous privacy along with top-shelf lodge amenities just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola.

Among the suites at One Steamboat Place, Summit Peak stands out for the spaciousness of its high-ceilinged, open-plan living area. In the lounge, a large leather sectional couch faces the central hearth, with its wood-burning fireplace and flat screen television, perfect for relaxing together after a long day on the slopes. On the opposite side of the hearth, the dining table for ten is set inside a cozy niche, where you'll savor warm, hearty meals at night. The kitchen is fully equipped with Viking appliances and a breakfast bar. The suite also includes a nice office nook with iMac computer and high-speed WiFi. And from the living area, glass doors open to the outdoor patio with Viking grill, where you can barbeque and sip warm cocktails in the crisp mountain air.

The bedrooms are wonderfully cozy, with wall-to-wall-carpeting and beautiful natural light. The master bedroom features a king size bed, a stone hearth with gas fireplace and mounted flat screen television, a private outdoor deck, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted bathtub. The second bedroom also features a king bed, along with ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub. The third bedroom includes two queen beds and twin bunk beds, while the fourth has two queen beds. Both the third and fourth bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone bath/shower combo.

Guests at Summit Peak enjoy access to One Steamboat Place's world-class lodge amenities, including the heated outdoor pool and hot tub, the gorgeous and capacious Great Room, and the Little Tykes Room for children. Valet service and shuttle service to the ski slopes are also included.

For embarking on the day's adventure, you won't find a better location in Steamboat Springs. The Steamboat Gondola is just a minute's walk away, while Steamboat Springs Old Town, Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, City Market, and the beautiful Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs are just a short drive from your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get the glam of the big city on the quaint historic Main Street of Park City at Parkite on Main Three Seven. This contemporary vacation rental offers 2,600 square feet of chic interiors packed with luxury amenities, all overlooking one of the most charming downtown areas in Utah. With golf and skiing both close by, it’s an ideal destination for a summer getaway with friends, a winter holiday with family or even a honeymoon in the mountains.

Take in the Park City scene from above on a furnished private balcony with a barbecue, or soak off a day on the slopes on the al-fresco hot tub. For cozier evenings indoors, there’s a gas fireplace and wine cooler, as well as high-tech features from a smart TV and integrated sound system to Wi-Fi.

At the heart of Parkite on Main Three Seven is an open-concept great room that draws inspiration from mid-century modern style, with an Eames lounger in the sitting area and a mix of molded plastic and plywood chairs around the dining table. Pale wood cabinets and metal Tolix stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen lend contemporary edge.

The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and direct access to the terrace with the hot tub, and two bedrooms with queen beds, both of which open to a shared terrace. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and stunning details such as four-poster bedframes, upholstered headboards or mid-century side chairs.

Parkite on Main Three Seven is less than a 10-minute walk from the shops, restaurants and entertainment along Park City’s historic Main Street, as well as the local favorite Park Silly Sunday Market and the Town Lift chairlift and Park City Mountain Resort. It’s also a 10-minute drive or less to the bases of two ski resorts and the nearest golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Trickle Creek is a private luxury residence within the renowned One Steamboat Place, a stunning lodge and spa complex literally steps from Steamboat Gondola. With four bedrooms accommodating eight people, Trickle Creek is the ideal vacation rental for friends and families seeking a cozy home base while enjoying some of the finest Rocky Mountain slopes.

The open-plan living area features a wall of glass doors gazing out on the Yampa Valley and Flat Top Mountains. The lounge is ideal for enjoying relaxing evenings together, with a cozy sectional couch and leather armchairs surrounding the wood-burning fireplace set within a gorgeous stone hearth, and the mounted flat screen television beside it. Hardwood floors, beautiful wooden furnishings, and a wonderful vintage print evoke classic Colorado tradition and charm. Beside the lounge, an elegant wood dining table seats ten in beautifully upholstered chairs, just off the fully equipped kitchen with its large breakfast bar for four. The glass doors from the living area open \ to a private balcony with Viking gas grill, ideal for evening barbeques.

The bedrooms offer warm sanctuary for restful nights. The master bedroom features a king bed facing a fireplace set within a classic stone hearth, and its ensuite bathroom includes stand-alone steam shower and jetted bathtub. The second room features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub, while the third room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with shower/tub combo. Two double beds are in the fourth bedroom, with access to the bathroom in the hall.

Beyond your private suite, you'll also enjoy access to the beautiful lodge areas of One Steamboat Place. When the ski suit comes off, take a restorative soak in the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. And in the evening, kick back in the Great Room with its impressive stone fire place flanked by large, mountain-view windows.

There may be no better location for enjoying the delights of Steamboat. To hit the slopes, the Steamboat Gondola is only a minute's walk away. For an idyllic day of golf, Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course is within minutes by car. Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, like a deluxe spa in the heart of the forest, is also close by.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Unforgettable is an extraordinary farmhouse villa near Kenwood in the Sonoma Valley. Blending rustic country living with superb contemporary amenities and style, the secluded villa features ample outdoor space for relaxation, dining, and play, while the 5,000-square interior includes gorgeous living areas and five bedroom suites. For families, friends, and destination wedding guests seeking a unique yet quintessential vacation rental in California Wine Country, Unforgettable is ideal.

The beautifully landscaped grounds invite you to enchanting days in the delicious Sonoma air. Enjoy mornings by the swimming pool, plunging into the clear blue waters, bathing in the hot tub, and savouring the sunlight on elegant loungers. At lunchtime, fire up the barbecue grill and gather at the alfresco table for ten. Upon returning from a vineyard tour or hike, spend the afternoon at the bocce court, then open a bottle of fine Napa wine on the veranda, relishing the woodland views.

Indoors, the beautiful farmhouse structure—with high, vaulted ceilings, rustic wood crossbeams, and lovely hanging lanterns—provides an exquisite setting for evenings together. Savour a pre-dinner glass in the sumptuous central lounge, and gather in the dining room for a feast of local fare. The spectacular kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, including a Wolf range with eight burners and two ovens, as well as a large island bar and doors to the alfresco patio. At night, stay toasty by the fireplace in the cozy living room.

The Main House features four bedrooms, three with king beds and one with two twins (convertible into a king), while the Guest House has a king bedroom and its own kitchenette. All of the bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and lovely private patios, perfect for morning coffee or afternoon downtime.

While providing privacy and seclusion, Unforgettable is ideally situated for exploring the natural beauty and world-class winemaking of Sonoma Valley and nearby Napa. You're just five minutes from the closest winery and twelve from Glen Ellen, while Anndadel State Park and Sugarloaf State Park are both fifteen minutes away. Sonoma Square is a thirteen-mile drive, and Kenwood Community Farmers Market is just ten minutes down the road.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pairing a slopeside location with European charm, Chamonix 26 brings you the best of Aspen. This luxury Colorado vacation rental is part of the Chamonix community, and its three suite-style bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests. Spend your stay taking advantage of the ski-in, ski-out access to Assay Hill or taking the complimentary shuttle into Snowmass Village or downtown Aspen.

Guests of Chamonix 26 are welcome to use the shared slopeside ski locker, stretch out in the fitness center or soak in the community pool and hot tub. The community offers bell and concierge service, as well as daily newspaper delivery. For private entertaining, the unit has its own balcony with a barbecue and mountain views, and, inside, a wood-burning fireplace and surround sound system for cozy evenings in.

Refined furnishings and an open-plan layout give Chamonix 26 both old-world appeal and modern style. Gather around the fireplace and TV on one of the sofas, or catch up on reading in the armchairs tucked into a bay of windows. There’s plenty more seating around the formal dining table and on the stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms can easily welcome groups of friends or family traveling together. There are two with king beds and ski-slope views, and one with a queen bed and sofa bed. Espresso-toned wood, neutral tones of charcoal and gray, and small sitting areas make the bedrooms inviting places to linger after a day out on the hills.

Your holiday at Chamonix 26 includes shuttle service to Snowmass Village and even greater Aspen destinations like the airport. At the end of a day of skiing, make the 20-minute drive to downtown Aspen to browse the boutiques and galleries for the perfect souvenir or to sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at one of its fine restaurants. For a memorable day trip (or a break from skiing), treat yourself to a few hours at Glenwood Hot Springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into a serene retreat with modern style at The Ascent 301. This beautiful residence is set on a corner, offering views of the mountains surrounding Vail Valley and a location close to shopping, dining and skiing. Take the private ski-season shuttle to Beaver Creek Village, or spend your holiday relaxing in comfort with up to six friends or family members.

The villa also has its own perks such as a gas fireplace, so you can start and end the day on the right note.

Chic and comfortable, The Ascent 301 is laid out around a central great room with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. A sofa, loveseat and armchair are cozy spots to curl up by the fireplace and television, and a desk by the wall of windows is perfect for catching up on emails via Wi-Fi. The dining area makes a bold statement with a glass-topped table and cherry-red, leather-clad chairs, and there’s additional seating at the kitchen’s breakfast bar as well.

Choose from three bedrooms with a king bed, queen bed and two twin beds that can easily accommodate families or groups of friends. Both the king and queen bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms with jetted tubs; the twin bedroom has a shared hall bathroom.

The Ascent community is at the heart of Beaver Creek Village, which was modeled on a European ski resort and placed in the midst of stunning Colorado scenery. The mountains make an unforgettable backdrop for fun-filled getaways and active honeymoons alike, and there’s a lively après-ski scene in the town of Avon, just a 10-minute walk from the villa.

Business License Number: 003670

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
_ The City of Palm Springs ID # 3335 _

This gorgeous Palm Springs luxury villa, situated a few minutes from downtown, enjoys wonderful proximity to several world-class golf courses and is an easy drive to Indio and the Coachella Festival Grounds. Newly designed and built in 2017, the villa features superb alfresco living and dining areas, spectacular views of the Sonoran Desert hills, exquisite interior spaces appointed with high-end appliances and amenities, and six fabulous bedroom suites. For families and friends seeking a supreme balance of convenience, style, and contemporary comforts in the Southern California desert, 5 Palms Estate is an ideal choice.

The villa's terrace has the air of a beautiful desert oasis, with lush gardens surrounding a sparkling swimming pool and hot tub. The pool's submerged shelf is furnished with loungers and armchairs, ideal for savoring the sun over cool refreshments. Cook a barbeque lunch at the grill and relish it alfresco at the mountain-view table, watching the hills deepen in beauty as day yields to evening. At night, kindle the fire pit and savor a California wine under the canopy of stars.

The terrace joins the fabulous interior through ample glass doors, creating a magnificent space for relaxation and entertainment. Spend evenings with family and friends in the sumptuous living room, staying warm by the fire and watching the large TV. Prepare meals in the superb, fully equipped kitchen, serving cocktails at the wide bar, and sit for a delicious feast at the lovely dining table for twelve.

All six bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and doors to the terrace. The spacious master suite includes a king bed, and its bathroom features a lovely stand-alone tub.Four of the guest suites have queen beds while the other has two twins which can be converted to an Eastern King upon request. Each bedroom has air conditioning and a TV.

The world-class art, film, and dining of downtown Palm Springs are minutes from your door, while golfers are five minutes from Mesquite and an easy drive to Escena, Indian Canyons, and PGA West. You're about twenty-three miles to Indio, home of Indian Wells and the Coachella Music Festival. The villa includes a parking garage as well as an charging station for electric cars.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With direct gondola access to the Steamboat Ski Area, this alpine villa is ideal for outdoor enthusiasts. The modern yet rustic interior features natural slate accents with dark wooden details and stainless steel décor. Hit the slopes in the morning and discover the downtown core by night; hiking and biking trails await as well as museums, shopping, and unique dining experiences.

Large picture windows look out onto the Flat Tops mountain range. The open floor plan is punctuated by sumptuous furnishings in a glacial colour scheme. Cow print rugs (a nod to the region’s Western heritage) sit under the formal dining table while artful chandeliers illuminate each space. Folding glass doors open from the gourmet kitchen onto the wrap-around balcony. During warmer months, the terrace is a serene spot to sit in the mornings, enjoy a cup of coffee and listen to the sounds of nature. End the evening by relaxing in the hot tub and rejuvenating your body for tomorrow’s adventures.

Located in the heart of the Wildhorse Meadows neighborhood, you have central (and convenient) access to both mountain and town. After a long day of exploring runs and trails, relax with an après-ski movie marathon. Let the kids battle it out at the foosball table while you curl up on the plump sofa with a glass of wine in hand. An open-air fire pit is a focal point of the deck, and a great spot to gather around with the whole family. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Fall asleep in the quiet of snow falling on ski slopes at Sundance Mountain 508—and in the morning, step just outside to ski them. This beautifully appointed vacation rental is part of One Steamboat Place, which offers a ski-in, ski-out location in the heart of Steamboat Springs as well as luxury amenities. Reserve this spacious four-bedroom Colorado property for a winter getaway with friends or a relaxed holiday with family.

Guests of Sundance Mountain 508 are welcome to use the heated outdoor pool, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, games room and children’s playroom at One Steamboat Place. Shuttle service and continental breakfast are also included in your stay during the winter. For entertaining or relaxing in private, the villa has a balcony with a barbecue and a living area with a TV, Wi-Fi and a cozy fireplace.

An open-plan great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen makes it easy for the whole party to gather together. The kitchen has professional-grade appliances, so it’s a pleasure to prepare après-ski snacks. Hallmarks of One Steamboat Place style, from saturated colors and natural textures to luxe fabrics, feature throughout.

There are three bedrooms with king beds at Sundance Mountain 508, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one with two twin-over-queen bunk beds that’s great for children. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

The villa’s convenient location goes beyond its ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola. Shopping and dining are just outside in the plaza, and the property is less than a 10-minute drive from the nearest grocery store, Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course and the family-friendly, naturally heated pools of Steamboat Springs Old Town. For a romantic evening out, relive your honeymoon with a soak at Strawberry Park Hot Springs, 10 miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with Stand-alone shower & bathtub, Dual Vanity, Gas fireplace, Television

listing.listing_description:
Modern, airy and full of natural sunlight, the resplendent Anini Vista Drive Estate instills a vision of tranquility upon its guests. Located in Kauai, it’s the perfect villa for an extraordinary Hawaiian vacation. This Kauai luxury villa boasts an extraordinary seven thousand square feet including a huge covered lanai (balcony). You will not be disappointed with views of the ocean off in the distance.

Anini Vista Drive Estate has a showcase dining room, living room, giant masonry fireplace, sitting room, family room, theater room with copper sink for fixing snacks and two sets of laundry facilities. Placed throughout the living areas are five home theaters with twenty-four inch HDTVs. There’s also plenty of opportunity to dine alfresco. There’s an outdoor grill in the stone cabana and gas tiki torches to light at night. There is also a nine thousand gallon salt water, lagoon-style pool and spa, complete with two waterfalls and grotto. This villa takes the Hawaiian dream to the next level—keep your eye out for rainbows!

The architecture is classic island design with open floor plans, hardwood floors, ample glass and natural light, high wooden-beamed ceilings, ceiling fans and strategic use of stone throughout. For the chef in your entourage, Anini Vista Drive Estate has a dream kitchen that is ready for anything. Three dishwashers, two sub-zero refrigerators, gas cook top, two microwaves, two under counter refrigerators, ice maker, two custom copper farm front sinks, a copper prep sink and granite counters make this kitchen the delight of any culinary genius.

With a total of five spectacular bedrooms, this boutique villa can accommodate up to twelve guests. Each bedroom offers a unique set of perks. From vaulted ceilings, to stunning beach artwork and intricate wooden ceilings, you’ll never be disappointed with whatever room you choose. Let your lavish and colorful surroundings conjure up sweet, romantic dreams.

Anini Vista Drive Estate boasts the longest and widest fringing reef in the Hawaiian Islands, and because of the unique conditions, it has generally well protected waters and some of the most consistent conditions for water activities. Enjoy snorkeling, beach walks, picnicking, paddle boarding and wind surfing. A breathtaking Hawaiian vacation awaits!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a truly great ski holiday at the perfectly named Splendor au Soleil. This Breckenridge vacation rental is located in the exclusive Sunbeam Estates, close to ice skating, shopping, dining and Breckenridge Ski Resort. Its two large bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to ten and are ideal for an extended family or friends traveling with younger children.

This luxury property boasts amenities from a private al-fresco hot tub and heated three-car garage to a television, sound system and Wi-Fi. If you’ll be visiting in warmer weather, you can take in the mountain views from a furnished deck with a barbecue. No matter what time of year you’re staying, laundry facilities mean you’ll always start the next day’s adventures with fresh gear.

From its stone accent walls and beamed ceilings to its thoughtfully chosen furnishings and open-concept layout, Splendor au Soleil blends European elegance with contemporary Colorado style. There’s plenty of room for everyone to spread out and relax in a spacious great room with living and dining areas, a cozy television nook, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

The villa features two large bedrooms: one with a king bed and queen sleeper sofa, and one with a king bed and twin trundle bed. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and resort views. For larger parties, there’s also a queen sleeper sofa in the home’s great room.

A convenient location means you can take a little honeymoon from chauffeuring everyone around. Splendor au Soleil is less than a 10-minute walk from downtown Breckenridge, where you’ll find a wealth of shopping and dining options, as well as a grocery store and the town ice rink. It’s also just two blocks from a stop where you can catch a free shuttle into town. Winter visitors will appreciate the 1-mile drive to Breckenridge Ski Resort.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bring your modern family on a ski holiday to a contemporary chalet at Caldera Valles. This exquisitely designed Jackson Hole vacation rental is on the penthouse level of Caldera House, which offers the amenities of a luxury boutique hotel and the privacy of a home in the heart of Teton Village. Its four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight in a convenient ski-in location.

Guests are welcome to use the shared fitness center, sauna and heated outdoor pool at Caldera House. The villa also has its own private balcony with a hot tub and al-fresco dining for six, as well as cozy indoor entertaining areas including a media room and featuring Apple TV, a sound system, Wi-Fi, a fireplace and a wine fridge.

Wyoming-based firm Carney Logan Burke designed the complex with materials drawn from the surroundings, from Douglas-fir timbers to copper panels, along with plenty of glass to showcase the views. The villa picks up on this thoughtful style, with vaulted ceilings and nearly wall-to-wall windows that frame a vista of Rendezvous Mountain. The open-concept living and dining areas are sleek and sophisticated, and the kitchen is fully equipped.

Caldera Valles has two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own lounge area, fireplace and balcony. The other two bedrooms have two twin bunk beds and two twin beds plus two trundle beds, respectively. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

A slopeside location gives Caldera House ski-in access from Jackson Hole Resort. It’s also a 1-minute walk from the hotel to the resort’s aerial tram, and a 2-minute walk to the center of Teton Village, where you’ll find a range of shops and restaurants. A short drive will bring you to the nearest golf course and the town of Jackson, and both Grand Teton National Park and Yellowstone National Park are also reachable by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steamboat Springs is truly a “ski town” in every way. From the tops of the mountain, to the chalets, and throughout the vibrant downtown, if you love skiing, you’ll love Steamboat. And, Sage Creek is right at the heart of it all. Less than a minute away from the Steamboat Gondola, this luxury rental will have you at the top of the mountain in a flash.

Warm, cozy, and with a slope side view, after a long day of skiing you’ll love the inviting atmosphere of Sage Creek. Curl up on the comfortable couch in front of the beautiful stone fireplace. Relax and watch a movie with the family, or invite some friends for dinner, there’s lots of space. With hard wood flooring, earthy tones, and a ski lodge ambience, Sage Creek incorporates rustic charm into its luxurious features. Moving into the kitchen you’ll find gourmet appliances, stainless steel fixtures, and plenty of functional countertop workspace. Burgundy cabinetry adds a nice pop of colour to the kitchen’s portion of the open concept great room. An ideal social space for the whole family, Sage Creek’s great room is just where you’ll want to be after a day on the slopes.

Another relaxing attraction at Steamboat Resort is the heated outdoor pool and hot tub, to which you’ll have shared access. On Sage Creek’s balcony you’ll find cozy outdoor furniture, great for an alfresco meal cooked on the barbecue. Inside, there’s formal dining for ten, and an extra few spots at the kitchen breakfast bar. And, if you feel like staying connected to the rest of the world, there’s Wi-Fi, a flat screen television, and a DVD player in the living room.

If you’re feeling like taking a break from skiing, Steamboat Springs has lots of other great attractions. Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course is a great way to take in some of the scenic views of this dynamic mountain landscape.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Add style to your ski holiday with a stay at Lodge at Shooting Star 1. Part of a luxury community in the heart of the dramatic Wyoming landscape, close to golf and ski slopes, this vacation rental gives you easy access to outdoor adventure in the mountains. Its thoughtful interiors and three bedrooms can welcome a small family or a group of friends—or can be reserved for an active honeymoon.

Take in the mountain views from an open flagstone deck and an enclosed porch, which feature a barbecue, al-fresco dining for ten and a hot tub. Or enjoy the vistas indoors while settled in front of the TV and Wi-Fi next to the fireplace. For your comfort and convenience, the villa also has heating, air conditioning and laundry facilities.

Beautifully designed by local architect John Carney, the lodge showcases its surroundings even as it creates a cozy ambience. A cathedral ceiling, stone fireplace and full-height window are the highlights of the open-concept great room, adding drama and flooding the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen with light and scenic views. There’s also a separate media room that’s a welcoming spot to curl up with a movie.

The lodge has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own gas fireplace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, there’s a sofa bed in the media room.

Lodge at Shooting Star 1 is less than a 10-minute walk from the Shooting Star Golf Course and less than a 5-minute drive from Jackson Hole Mountain Resort and Teton Village. Find shopping and dining options in the nearby towns of Jackson and Wilson. For an unforgettable day trip, follow the community’s bike path to the entrance of Grand Teton National Park or make the drive to Yellowstone National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beyond the palm trees, soaring mountain views await at this breezy desert home in Palm Springs. Sip your morning coffee in the backyard lounge. Sit for a leisurely brunch at the kitchen’s breakfast bar or dine around the modern picnic table next to the saltwater pool. Then, take a few shots on the putting green before heading out for a day at one of the many golf courses in the area.

Spread across one-level, Yellow Palms many openings to the terrace supply a refreshing and natural ventilation, letting the warm desert air flow in freely. The spacious layout is perfect for a golf vacation or getaway with friends. Vibrant colors add subtle flashes of excitement to the modern-contemporary interior. In the afternoon, challenge a friend to a game of bocce, do some grilling on the barbecue, and throw the big game on the widescreen. At night, the hot tub is the perfect place to recharge your batteries after an exciting day.

Start the next morning with a 5-minute walk to the Warm Sands neighborhood for artisan bagels, fresh pastries, and a little shopping at the antique mall. Walk 5-minutes further to the bustling streets of downtown Palm Springs, where even more shopping, restaurants, art galleries, and museums await. If you’re in town for a festival, Yellow Palms is located 5-minutes from Coachella’s Palm Springs shuttle-service.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

K0062 - Yellow Palms - City I.D.#3331 TOT Permit: 3085

listing.listing_description:
Situated just outside of downtown Breckenridge and its many ski access points, you’ll find Grace Manor enjoying its private, and incredibly scenic mountain view location. Perfect for a family ski vacation, golf trip with friends or an exciting corporate retreat, Grace Manor’s spacious interiors, and convenient location are ready to host your group of twelve. Whether you’re vacationing in the summer or winter, Breckenridge Ski Resort and its Main Street have plenty of incredible attractions and activities for the whole group to enjoy on your Luxury Retreats vacation.

This mountain-chic ski lodge features high-end appliances and state of the art electronics, all thoughtfully integrated into its natural feeling alpine atmosphere. Wood, stone, and soaring mountain views show off Grace Manor’s traditional, rugged side, while chandelier lights and designer furnishing add elegance to the luxurious environment. The great room is warm and welcoming, with a beautiful stone fireplace, plush seating, and wide screen television. The kitchen is more than ready with its two refrigerators, dishwashers, and ovens. In the recreational room, your guests will love sitting at the bar, playing pool, and watching the big game on the big screen. There’s also a den with a television and video game systems, which is great for kids and guests that require a little extra privacy.

After a long day on the slopes, drop your wet gear off in the heated garage and head for the eight-person hot tub on the deck, it’s the perfect place to warm-up, relax, and rejuvenate. From the deck, you’ll enjoy an endless view of the Tenmile Range, which is part of Breckenridge’s extension of the majestic Rocky Mountains.

While you’re in town, spend some time exploring the Historic Main Street District and Main Street Station, where you’ll find plenty of great spots for dinner and drinks, boutique shopping, and vibrant nightlife. If you’re traveling in the summer, golf, hiking, rock climbing, and zip-lining are all adventurous ways to spend your days. In the winter, Breckenridge Ski Resort is absolutely World-class.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A stand of pines, a trio of stone fireplaces, and a range of mountains soar toward the sky at this secluded Big Sky lodge. Cozy up next to the fire in two living rooms with vaulted ceilings or on a deck facing the snowy peaks. The villa is a 3-minute drive from the manicured Spanish Peaks golf course, but it’s surrounded by fish-filled rivers, hiking trails, and plenty more wild Montana scenery. 

Spot snow on the peaks and listen to wind whistle through the pines from a furnished private deck with a barbecue. If you’ve been out in the mountains all day, leave gear in the mudroom and adjourn to the media room, warm your toes by the fireplace, pour a glass from the wine cellar to sip while posting holiday photos via Wi-Fi, or switch on the satellite TV and integrated sound system. 

At the heart of this vacation rental’s nearly 5,000 square feet of living space is a spectacular great room with vaulted ceilings, two stone fireplaces, a spiral staircase, and oversized windows framing mountain views. Sit down with friends and family in the two living areas, or gather at a dining table for 8 or the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. 

This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The other 3 bedrooms include one with a king bed and 2 with queen beds; all 3 have shared access to hall bathrooms. 

Since Bear Den Lodge is part of the Spanish Peaks community, a private enclave on 6,000 acres of Big Sky country, guests are welcome at the Spanish Peaks clubhouse, a 3-minute drive away. Play on the golf course, book a fishing excursion or horseback ride, pedal it out on the mountain-bike trails, or relive your honeymoon with a romantic activity like a starlit sleigh ride. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Here’s the establishing shot: the rugged silhouettes of the Santa Monica Mountains, the city lights flicking on, and the hot tub bubbling on the rooftop terrace of this modern home in one of L.A.’s trendiest neighborhoods. The views of scenery and skyline are unforgettable, and the indoor-outdoor living is easy thanks to glass walls. It’s less than 10 minutes to must-shop The Grove.

For sunny California days, there’s a swimming pool with a waterfall feature and plenty of loungers; for hot L.A. nights, there are 2 hot tubs, including one on the rooftop deck with views to spare, an alfresco dining table for 6, and a fire feature that’s the perfect gathering spot for an after-dinner drink.

Thoughtful modern architecture—sliding glass doors, retractable windows, a floating staircase, and an open-plan layout—creates sun-splashed interiors. Details like blond-wood floors and crisp white walls up the airy feeling in the living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen.

Nestled into the buzzy Beverly Grove area, the villa is only a 7-minute drive from its namesake shopping and entertainment complex, The Grove. Treat yourself there or at one of the other boutiques and restaurants that fill the neighborhood. It’s less than 2 miles to the Los Angeles County Museum of Art and less than 10 to the Getty Center for your dose of art, and if you’re traveling with kids, nearby Universal Studios is a great day trip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Vines creep up columns and brick arches overhead at this traditional stone mansion just outside downtown Austin. The splashing of the pool water feature makes a calming backdrop to dinner outdoors or drinks inside the newly renovated, window-lined rooms. It’s 10 miles from the 1-acre property to a free tour of the Texas State Capitol building and a hike to the viewpoint atop Mount Bonnell. 

Spend sunny days reading outside on the loungers, cooling off in the swimming pool, trying to dunk on friends and family on the private basketball court, and serving fare from the outdoor kitchen at the alfresco table for 6. Make it a movie night in the home theater, binge-watch the latest season of a show on the streaming TV, or share updates from your holiday via Wi-Fi. 

Shaded by lush landscaping and a tiled roof, this vacation rental feels hidden away. Stone walls and barrel-vaulted brick ceilings add to the charm in the open-plan living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar. A wall of windows overlooking the pool terrace fills the space with light. 

There are 4 bedrooms in the main house of this luxury estate and 1 in a separate casita. The main house has a master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom, 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and 1 bedroom with a queen bed that shares a hall bathroom with a children’s room, which has a twin-over-queen bunk bed. The casita is a private retreat perfect for a honeymoon-style escape, with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. 

A stay at this villa means you’re 9 minutes from teeing off at the nearest golf course and less than 10 miles from Zilker Metropolitan Park, whose nearly 400 acres include the spring-fed, natural-wonder Barton Springs Pool. Drive 10 miles for a tour of the state capitol building, and 11 miles to the restaurants, bars, venues, and museums of downtown Austin. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located two minutes from the bustling village center, with Ski-in/Ski-out access to the Village Express Lift, Hayden Lodge will have you on the slopes of Snowmass in no-time. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, Snowmass is a haven for hiking, climbing, and mountain bike enthusiasts. In the village, you’ll love shopping for all the latest gear and taking part in vibrant mountain nightlife. Back home, Hayden Lodge has accommodations for eight spread across its three bedrooms and pull-out sofa.

Hayden’s great room enjoys soaring mountain views, thanks to the extra-high, vaulted-ceiling and large windows. Beside the mountain view, you’ll love warming up by the fireplace, and relaxing on the plush furniture of the lounge. Behind the lounge, the kitchen’s breakfast bar acts as a divider between social spaces and the kitchen’s working area.

During your stay, you’ll have shared access to the outdoor hot tub, ski lockers, and Treehouse Kids Adventure Center of Hayden Lodge. This three-bedroom villa comes with garage parking, and daily housekeeping in the winter months. Inside, you’ll appreciate the fully equipped kitchen, breakfast bar, and formal dining area with space for eight. The villa is outfitted with cable television, a gas fireplace, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and more.

After you’ve spent a day or two exploring Snowmass, consider a trip to one of the other ski areas, Buttermilk Mountain, Aspen Highlands, and Aspen Mountain, within ten miles. After a day on the slopes, treat yourself to a night on the town. In Snowmass, Little Mammoth Steakhouse is a favorite among locals and visitors. After, head nine miles east to the town of Aspen, where you’ll find a wide range of nightlife destinations. If you’re in town during the summer, Snowmass and Aspen both have great golf clubs with scenic and challenging courses. And, if you’re traveling with children, the “Very Important Kids” programs at Snowmass have a wide range of options and lessons, available all year round.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
